alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:00PM CDT until July 21 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BURLEIGH AND NORTHEASTERN MORTON COUNTIES... At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Harmon, or 5 miles north of Mandan, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Mandan around 405 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bismarck, Lincoln, Mcdowell Dam Recreation Area and Menoken. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
